verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

שְׁלַח־ <S%H7971><s%> Send לְךָ֣ אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> thou men וְיָתֻ֙רוּ֙ <S%H8446><s%> that they may search אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am נֹתֵ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> which I give לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of every אֶחָד֩ <S%H259><s%> a man אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> A man אֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> a לְמַטֵּ֤ה <S%H4294><s%> tribe אֲבֹתָיו֙ <S%H1><s%> of their fathers תִּשְׁלָ֔חוּ <S%H7971><s%> shall ye send כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> every נָשִׂ֥יא <S%H5387><s%> every one a ruler בָהֶֽם׃

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אֹתָ֥ם <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses מִמִּדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> them from the wilderness פָּארָ֖ן <S%H6290><s%> of Paran עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> by the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כֻּלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> all אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> men רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> heads בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> [were]

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְׁמוֹתָ֑ם <S%H8034><s%> And these [were] their names לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֔ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben שַׁמּ֖וּעַ <S%H8051><s%> Shammua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זַכּֽוּר׃ <S%H2139><s%> of Zaccur
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> Of the tribe שִׁמְע֔וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon שָׁפָ֖ט <S%H8202><s%> Shaphat בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חוֹרִֽי׃ <S%H2753><s%> of Hori
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> Of the tribe יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah כָּלֵ֖ב <S%H3612><s%> Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְפֻנֶּֽה׃ <S%H3312><s%> of Jephunneh
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> Of the tribe יִשָּׂשכָ֔ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar יִגְאָ֖ל <S%H3008><s%> Igal בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph
לְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> Of the tribe אֶפְרָ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim הוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <S%H1954><s%> Oshea בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נֽוּן׃ <S%H5126><s%> of Nun
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> Of the tribe בִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin פַּלְטִ֖י <S%H6406><s%> Palti בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רָפֽוּא׃ <S%H7505><s%> of Raphu
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> Of the tribe זְבוּלֻ֔ן <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun גַּדִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H1427><s%> Gaddiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son סוֹדִֽי׃ <S%H5476><s%> of Sodi

לְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> Of the tribe יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> [namely] of the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh גַּדִּ֖י <S%H1426><s%> Gaddi בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son סוּסִֽי׃ <S%H5485><s%> of Susi
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> Of the tribe דָ֔ן <S%H1835><s%> of Dan עַמִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H5988><s%> Ammiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גְּמַלִּֽי׃ <S%H1582><s%> of Gemalli
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> Of the tribe אָשֵׁ֔ר <S%H836><s%> of Asher סְת֖וּר <S%H5639><s%> Sethur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מִיכָאֵֽל׃ <S%H4317><s%> of Michael
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> Of the tribe נַפְתָּלִ֔י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali נַחְבִּ֖י <S%H5147><s%> Nahbi בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son וָפְסִֽי׃ <S%H2058><s%> of Vophsi
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> Of the tribe גָ֔ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad גְּאוּאֵ֖ל <S%H1345><s%> Geuel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מָכִֽי׃ <S%H4352><s%> of Machi

אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> These [are] the names הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> of the men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sent מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> which Moses לָת֣וּר <S%H8446><s%> to spy out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> called מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לְהוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <S%H1954><s%> Oshea בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נ֖וּן <S%H5126><s%> of Nun יְהוֹשֻֽׁעַ׃ <S%H3091><s%> Jehoshua

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לָת֖וּר <S%H8446><s%> them to spy out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to עֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> unto them Get you up זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> there בַּנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> this [way] southward וַעֲלִיתֶ֖ם <S%H5927><s%> and go up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> into the mountain

וּרְאִיתֶ֥ם <S%H7200><s%> And see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> what it [is] and the people הַיֹּשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwelleth עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and הֶחָזָ֥ק <S%H2389><s%> therein whether they [be] strong הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he הֲרָפֶ֔ה <S%H7504><s%> or weak הַמְעַ֥ט <S%H4592><s%> few ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> or many

וּמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> How הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And what the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> they יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> [is] that they dwell in בָּ֔הּ הֲטוֹבָ֥ה <S%H2896><s%> whether it [be] good הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> or bad וּמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> How הֶֽעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> and what cities אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> they יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> [they be] that they dwell בָּהֵ֔נָּה <S%H2007><s%> in הַבְּמַֽחֲנִ֖ים <S%H4264><s%> whether in tents אִ֥ם <S%H518><s%> or בְּמִבְצָרִֽים׃ <S%H4013><s%> or in strong holds

וּמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> How הָ֠אָרֶץ <S%H776><s%> And what the land הַשְּׁמֵנָ֨ה <S%H8082><s%> [is] whether it [be] fat הִ֜וא <S%H1931><s%> he אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or רָזָ֗ה <S%H7330><s%> or lean הֲיֵֽשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> whether there be בָּ֥הּ עֵץ֙ <S%H6086><s%> wood אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or אַ֔יִן <S%H369><s%> not וְהִ֨תְחַזַּקְתֶּ֔ם <S%H2388><s%> therein or not And be ye of good courage וּלְקַחְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3947><s%> and bring מִפְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> of the fruit הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וְהַ֨יָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> Now the time יְמֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> [was] the time בִּכּוּרֵ֥י <S%H1061><s%> of the firstripe עֲנָבִֽים׃ <S%H6025><s%> grapes

וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> So they went up וַיָּתֻ֣רוּ <S%H8446><s%> and searched אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מִמִּדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> from the wilderness צִ֥ן <S%H6790><s%> of Zin עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far רְחֹ֖ב <S%H7340><s%> unto Rehob לְבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> as men come חֲמָֽת׃ <S%H2574><s%> to Hamath

וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> And they ascended בַנֶּגֶב֮ <S%H5045><s%> by the south וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> and came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against חֶבְרוֹן֒ <S%H2275><s%> unto Hebron וְשָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> where אֲחִימַן֙ <S%H289><s%> where Ahiman שֵׁשַׁ֣י <S%H8344><s%> Sheshai וְתַלְמַ֔י <S%H8526><s%> and Talmai יְלִידֵ֖י <S%H3211><s%> the children הָעֲנָ֑ק <S%H6061><s%> of Anak וְחֶבְר֗וֹן <S%H2275><s%> [were] (Now Hebron שֶׁ֤בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> years נִבְנְתָ֔ה <S%H1129><s%> was built לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before צֹ֥עַן <S%H6814><s%> Zoan מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> Egypt

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> unto the brook אֶשְׁכֹּ֗ל <S%H812><s%> of Eshcol וַיִּכְרְת֨וּ <S%H3772><s%> and cut down מִשָּׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> there זְמוֹרָה֙ <S%H2156><s%> from thence a branch וְאֶשְׁכּ֤וֹל <S%H811><s%> cluster עֲנָבִים֙ <S%H6025><s%> of grapes אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> with one וַיִּשָּׂאֻ֥הוּ <S%H5375><s%> and they bare בַמּ֖וֹט <S%H4132><s%> upon a staff בִּשְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> it between two וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הָרִמֹּנִ֖ים <S%H7416><s%> and [they brought] of the pomegranates וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַתְּאֵנִֽים׃ <S%H8384><s%> and of the figs

לַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> The place הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he קָרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> was called נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> the brook אֶשְׁכּ֑וֹל <S%H812><s%> Eshcol עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> because אֹד֣וֹת <S%H182><s%> because of הָֽאֶשְׁכּ֔וֹל <S%H811><s%> the cluster of grapes אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which כָּרְת֥וּ <S%H3772><s%> cut down מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> which the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> And they returned מִתּ֣וּר <S%H8446><s%> from searching הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִקֵּ֖ץ <S%H7093><s%> after אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> forty יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וַיֵּלְכ֡וּ <S%H1980><s%> proceeded וַיָּבֹאוּ֩ <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֨ה <S%H4872><s%> to Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and אַהֲרֹ֜ן <S%H175><s%> and to Aaron וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲדַ֧ת <S%H5712><s%> and to all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in מִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> unto the wilderness פָּארָ֖ן <S%H6290><s%> of Paran קָדֵ֑שָׁה <S%H6946><s%> to Kadesh וַיָּשִׁ֨יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> and brought back אוֹתָ֤ם <S%H853><s%> דָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> word וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> unto them and unto all the congregation וַיַּרְא֖וּם <S%H7200><s%> and shewed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> them the fruit הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

וַיְסַפְּרוּ־ <S%H5608><s%> And they told לוֹ֙ וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> him and said בָּ֕אנוּ <S%H935><s%> We came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> where שְׁלַחְתָּ֑נוּ <S%H7971><s%> whither thou sentest וְ֠גַם <S%H1571><s%> certainly זָבַ֨ת <S%H2100><s%> us and surely it floweth חָלָ֥ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבַ֛שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he וְזֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> and this פִּרְיָֽהּ׃ <S%H6529><s%> and this [is] the fruit

אֶ֚פֶס <S%H657><s%> Nevertheless כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עַ֣ז <S%H5794><s%> [be] strong הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people הַיֹּשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwell בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land וְהֶֽעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> and the cities בְּצֻר֤וֹת <S%H1219><s%> [are] walled גְּדֹלֹת֙ <S%H1419><s%> great מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> [and] very וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and moreover יְלִדֵ֥י <S%H3211><s%> the children הָֽעֲנָ֖ק <S%H6061><s%> of Anak רָאִ֥ינוּ <S%H7200><s%> and moreover we saw שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

עֲמָלֵ֥ק <S%H6002><s%> The Amalekites יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land הַנֶּ֑גֶב <S%H5045><s%> of the south וְ֠הַֽחִתִּי <S%H2850><s%> and the Hittites וְהַיְבוּסִ֤י <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusites וְהָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <S%H567><s%> and the Amorites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> dwell בָּהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mountains וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> and the Canaanites יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> dwell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> by the sea וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and by יַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> and by the coast הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan

וַיַּ֧הַס <S%H2013><s%> stilled כָּלֵ֛ב <S%H3612><s%> And Caleb אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> before מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> before Moses וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said עָלֹ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> Let us go up נַעֲלֶה֙ <S%H5927><s%> at once וְיָרַ֣שְׁנוּ <S%H3423><s%> and possess אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָכ֥וֹל <S%H3201><s%> it for we are well able נוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> to overcome לָֽהּ׃

וְהָ֨אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H376><s%> the men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עָל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> that went up עִמּוֹ֙ <S%H5973><s%> with אָֽמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> with him said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> are not נוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> We be not able לַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to go up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> against the people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חָזָ֥ק <S%H2389><s%> for they [are] stronger ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> they מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> are too

וַיּוֹצִ֜יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> And they brought up דִּבַּ֤ת <S%H1681><s%> an evil report הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> of the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תָּר֣וּ <S%H8446><s%> which they had searched אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הָאָ֡רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The land אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which עָבַ֨רְנוּ <S%H5674><s%> through which we have gone בָ֜הּ לָת֣וּר <S%H8446><s%> to search אֹתָ֗הּ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> it [is] a land אֹכֶ֤לֶת <S%H398><s%> that eateth up יוֹשְׁבֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> thereof and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom רָאִ֥ינוּ <S%H7200><s%> that we saw בְתוֹכָ֖הּ <S%H8432><s%> in it אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> are men מִדּֽוֹת׃ <S%H4060><s%> of a great stature

וְשָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> There רָאִ֗ינוּ <S%H7200><s%> And there we saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּפִילִ֛ים <S%H5303><s%> the giants בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons עֲנָ֖ק <S%H6061><s%> of Anak מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַנְּפִלִ֑ים <S%H5303><s%> [which come] of the giants וַנְּהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become בְעֵינֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5869><s%> and we were in our own sight כַּֽחֲגָבִ֔ים <S%H2284><s%> as grasshoppers וְכֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> and so הָיִ֖ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> were in בְּעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> and so we were in their sight
